data.text: An exceptional place that I‚Äôd highly recommend. Great pools, food and so much for the kids to do. Didn‚Äôt leave the complex once, which tells its own story. Staff very friendly and content do enough to help. Big shout out to Bam who was super helpful throughout our stay and was adored by our kids. A top guy
data.title: Five stars

data.text:

data.title: Superb Palm tree court

data.text: Everything about the Palm Tree Court is just amazing. The staff are so attentive. Every restaurant is top draw. Special mentions to the White Orchid and the Taparie. The food here was fantastic and could not be faulted. Both so good we went twice, which unfortunately meant we could try some others, which I‚Äôm sure would have been wonderful as well. Every member of staff we came across were so helpful and attentive. Will be coming back one day.
data.title: Best Dubai Resort

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Stuart, 

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience at Palm Tree Court and that everything exceeded your expectations. 

It is fantastic to know that you found our associates to be attentive and that you enjoyed the dining experience, particularly the White Orchid and the Taparia. We are delighted that the culinary offerings were fantastic and left a lasting impression on you. 

We appreciate your kind words about our associates, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon! 

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text:
My husband booked this hotel for a half term winter break. Family of 4 ( children 19 and 12). 

Traveling to the resort in our private transfer we felt apprehensive leaving the city and heading through what seemed like a baron area past docklands etc. we shouldn't have worried though because although the resort was out of the city it was a vast resort with plenty for all and very secure. 

Our room was large and spacious with nice sea views. Plenty big enough for the 4 of us. 

Staff were friendly and attentive across the whole resort (3 hotels)

As part of the all inclusive package we could use the restaurant and facilities in each of the hotels. Plenty of options to choose from all the restaurants. We ate at the sports bar, Italian restaurant, captains bar, several of the buffet restaurants all of which had a great selection to choose from. 

Our only main criticism was that different bars had different drinks included/excluded  on the all inclusive menu. We was able to get a coke at one bar but another we would have to pay additional which seemed somewhat confusing. 

We enjoyed the kayaking and peddle boats that were included in our package. 

We only spent 2 full days in resort as we had booked excursions into the city and a desert safari otherwise we would have tried a lot more of what the resort had on offer. 

I would highly recommend for families who want to visit Dubai.
data.title: Half term Dubai family Holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear welshwat,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are glad to hear that you found Palm Tree Court to be a vast and secure resort with plenty to offer for your family's half-term winter break.

It is wonderful to hear that your room was spacious with nice sea view and that our associates were friendly and attentive throughout the entire resort. We are delighted that you enjoyed the variety of our culinary offerings, though we apologise for any confusion caused during your stay. Your feedback will certainly be taken into consideration for future improvements.

We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed kayaking and pedal boats, and we hope you had a fantastic time on your excursions into the city and the desert safari.

Thank you for recommending JA Palm Tree Court. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay soon!

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed

data.text:
We were totally blown away by the Palm Tree Court. It‚Äôs an outstanding family resort. 

We normally stay at the Atlantis or Jumeriah Beach Hotel but we wanted to try something different this year and give all inclusive a go as food and drinks are expensive in Dubai. 

We booked a Two Bedroom Residence Suite, which included butler services and lots of wonderful perks. We didn‚Äôt really know what to expect as we couldn‚Äôt find much information online in advance. We were totally blown away‚Ä¶ I agree with a previous review about the hotel unselling themselves. David, Marilyn, Mohammed and the Butler/Signature Pool team were incredible. We felt like royalty for the duration of our stay. 

We ate at Smoking Gun, White Orchid, Tapiera and Sette. Wonderful food and service - thank you Darause and Aakash.  Tamr for lunch was great too‚Ä¶ great staff again! And to Levi and his lovely Mum at the water activities! 

See you all again next year.
data.title: Incredible family resort

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear U2fan,

Thank you so much for your glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that you had an incredible experience at JA Palm Tree Court and that it exceeded your expectations as an outstanding family resort. 

It is fantastic to know that you enjoyed trying something different with our all-inclusive package. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to David, Marilyn, Mohammed, Darause, Aakash, Levi, and the entire Butler team for their exceptional service. It is also wonderful to hear that you enjoyed dining at our various restaurants

We cannot wait to welcome you back next year for another unforgettable stay!

Best regards,
Murad Ahmed
Resident Manager
JA The Resort
owner_response.author: Murad Ahmed
